companies.name: 3dverse
companies.description: 3dverse is a cloud-native, real-time 3D operating system that enables the creation and deployment of scalable, web-based digital twins and collaborative 3D environments. Their platform supports interoperability with IoT, APIs, and AI, and is used across industries such as architecture, manufacturing, and smart cities for real-time visualization, predictive maintenance, and immersive training.
